page.title: 12MY DAY _ BEFORE SCHOOL
page.content: I WAKE UP AT 7AM AND HAVE A CUP OF TEA AND HELP MY SISTER GET READY FOR SCHOOL.SHE GOES TO GOWERTON COMPREHENSIVE.AFTER MY SISTER HAS CAUGHT HER BUS I HAVE MY BREAKFAST OF SUGAR PUFFS.AT QUARTER TO EIGHT I GO UPSTAIRS AND GET WASHED AND CHANGED.ALBERT DELIVERS THE PAPERS AT EIGHT THIRTY TO OUR SHOP AT LLANMADOC AND I COUNT THEM AND PUT THEM IN PILES EG.THE SUN,EXPRESS,TIMES ETC.AFTER I HAVE DONE THE PAPERS I SAY GOODBYE TO MY MOTHER AND FATHER AND WAIT OUTSIDE FOR THE BUS.I CATCH THE SERVICE BUS TO SCHOOL AND THE DRIVERS ARE FRIENDLY.JUNIORS SIT UPSTAIRS AND INFANTS DOWNSTAIRS.WE HAVE A LADY ON THE BUS TO LOOK AFTER US AND HER NAME IS SHIRLEY.THE BUS TAKES 15 MINUTES YO GET TO SCHOOL. KAREN JONES AGE 11
